description: A keyword used for declaring integer variables.
A keyword used for declaring double-precision floating-point variables.
A keyword used for declaring string variables.
The assignment operator used to assign a value to a variable.
The addition operator used to add two values.
A keyword used to create conditional statements in C++.
A keyword used to create loops in C++.
A standard output stream in C++ used to display information.
A standard input stream in C++ used to read input from the user.
